publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1603# Cathie Craigie: Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area—That the Parliament notes the current review of acute hospital services in the north of Glasgow; recognises that residents of Kilsyth and Cumbernauld have historically received treatment from hospitals in the north of Glasgow; recognises that these hospitals are accessible for residents of Kilsyth, Cumbernauld and the surrounding area; notes that Lanarkshire Health Board has no desire to review this arrangement; and urges on Greater Glasgow Health Board to recognise these factors during the review process.
S1M-1603# Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area (lodged on 30 January 2001) Paul Martin*
S1M-1603# Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area (lodged on 30 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Bill Butler*

S1M-1603# Cathie Craigie: Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area—That the Parliament notes the current review of acute hospital services in the north of Glasgow; recognises that residents of Kilsyth and Cumbernauld have historically received treatment from hospitals in the north of Glasgow; recognises that these hospitals are accessible for residents of Kilsyth, Cumbernauld and the surrounding area; notes that Lanarkshire Health Board has no desire to review this arrangement; and urges Greater Glasgow Health Board to recognise these factors during the review process. Supported by: Paul Martin, Tommy Sheridan, Bill Butler
S1M-1603# Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area (lodged on 30 January 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1603# Acute Hospital Services: Kilsyth and Cumbernauld Area (lodged on 30 January 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*

Supported by: Paul Martin, Tommy Sheridan, Bill Butler, Donald Gorrie, Andrew Wilson, Dr Elaine Murray
